casebody.data:
2002-2022 (La. 10/25/02)

Brent L. MORGAN, Jr. v. LAFOURCHE RECREATION DISTRICT NO. 5 and Lafourche Parish Through the Lafourche Parish Council. No. 2002-C-2022. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Lafourche Recreation District No. 5 et al.; Lafourche Parish; Lafourche Parish Council; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Lafourche, 17th Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 85,208; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 CA 1226.

Denied.
